page.title: 07Sunday family life
page.content: On a Sunday my dad is usually up first,and my mum may get up with him or a little later,my dad will go outside to feed the cows and my mum will lay the breakfast table.Kathryn and I will get up a little later and have our breakfast.In the morning Kathryn will ask Emma(her friend)to play or go to her house to play.I practise the piano or do my homework untill dinner is ready,we always have cooked dinner on a Sunday lamb,chicken ,pork or lamb with potatoes and vegetables.After dinner my dad will help mum wipe the dinner things.And then we will all go into the television room,mum,Kathryn and I read the Sunday papers.My dad will watch Farming and the weather forcast. Afterwards Kathryn and I will change to go to Sunday School in our little parish church at Goytre.
